item.title: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning of Large Language Models for Unit Test Generation: An Empirical Study
item.description: Boosting unit test generation efficiency, this study empirically evaluates various parameter-efficient fine-tuning methods on LLMs, demonstrating comparable performance to full fine-tuning at signific…
